__e: That was a stupid mistake, and it's over.
Well, I'm sure it was just an innocent mistake.
And that once you got here, you realized that it was all a foolish mistake, that you lost your heart to see Katie.
- I don't know who they are! - You stupid man!
He was my blood but the man was stupid,
I mean, I was sure you were just gonna be a dead foolish man.

Coming up on a gun with a lousy knife, you damn fool.
Come on, come on, come here, come here, come here.
